verses.verse: <S%G2385>James,<s%> a bond-servant of <S%G2316>God<s%> and of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G1290>dispersed<s%> abroad, <S%G5463>greetings.<s%>
<S%G2233>Consider<s%> it <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> my <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4045>encounter<s%> <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G3986>trials,<s%>
<S%G1097>knowing<s%> that the <S%G1383>testing<s%> of your <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2716>produces<s%> <S%G5281>endurance.<s%>

And let <S%G5281>endurance<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> [its] <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G2041>result,<s%> that you may be <S%G5046>perfect<s%> and <S%G3648>complete,<s%> <S%G3007>lacking<s%> in <S%G3367>nothing.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of you <S%G3007>lacks<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> let him <S%G154>ask<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G1325>gives<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men<s%> <S%G574>generously<s%> and <S%G3361>without<s%> <S%G3679>reproach,<s%> and it will be <S%G1325>given<s%> to him.

But let him <S%G154>ask<s%> in <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3367>without<s%> <S%G3367>any<s%> <S%G1252>doubting,<s%> for the one who <S%G1252>doubts<s%> is <S%G7073>like<s%> the <S%G2830>surf<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G416>driven<s%> and <S%G4494>tossed<s%> by the <S%G4494>wind.<s%>
For let not that <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3633>expect<s%> that he will <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> from the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>
[being] a double-minded <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G182>unstable<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G3598>ways.<s%>
But let the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G5011>humble<s%> circumstances <S%G2744>glory<s%> in his <S%G5311>high<s%> <S%G5311>position;<s%>

and [let] the <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G4145>man<s%> [glory] in his <S%G5014>humiliation,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G438>flowering<s%> <S%G5528>grass<s%> he will <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away.<s%>

For the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G393>rises<s%> with a <S%G2742>scorching<s%> <S%G2742>wind,<s%> and <S%G3583>withers<s%> the <S%G5528>grass;<s%> and its <S%G438>flower<s%> <S%G1601>falls<s%> <S%G1601>off,<s%> and the <S%G2143>beauty<s%> of its <S%G4383>appearance<s%> is <S%G622>destroyed;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>too<s%> the <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G4145>man<s%> in the midst of his <S%G4197>pursuits<s%> will <S%G3133>fade<s%> <S%G3133>away.<s%>

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G5278>perseveres<s%> under <S%G3986>trial;<s%> for once he has <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G1384>approved,<s%> he will <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> [the Lord] has <S%G1861>promised<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G25>love<s%> Him.

Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> when he is <S%G3985>tempted,<s%> "I am being <S%G3985>tempted<s%> by <S%G2316>God<s%>"; for <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G551>cannot<s%> be <S%G551>tempted<s%> by <S%G2556>evil,<s%> and He <S%G846>Himself<s%> does not <S%G3985>tempt<s%> <S%G3762>anyone.<s%>
But <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> is <S%G3985>tempted<s%> when he is <S%G1828>carried<s%> <S%G1828>away<s%> and <S%G1185>enticed<s%> by his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1939>lust.<s%>

<S%G1534>Then<s%> when <S%G1939>lust<s%> has <S%G4815>conceived,<s%> it <S%G5088>gives<s%> <S%G5088>birth<s%> to <S%G266>sin;<s%> and when <S%G266>sin<s%> is <S%G658>accomplished,<s%> it <S%G616>brings<s%> <S%G616>forth<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>
Do not be <S%G4105>deceived,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brethren.<s%>

<S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1394>thing<s%> <S%G1394>bestowed<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G1434>gift<s%> is from <S%G509>above,<s%> <S%G2597>coming<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G5457>lights,<s%> with <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1762>there<s%> is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3883>variation,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5157>shifting<s%> <S%G644>shadow.<s%>

In the exercise of His <S%G1014>will<s%> He <S%G616>brought<s%> us <S%G616>forth<s%> by the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G1519>so<s%> that we might be, as it were, the <S%G536>first<s%> <S%G536>fruits<s%> among His <S%G2938>creatures.<s%>

[This] you <S%G3609>know,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brethren.<s%> But let <S%G3956>everyone<s%> be <S%G5036>quick<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G1021>slow<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> [and] <S%G1021>slow<s%> to <S%G3709>anger;<s%>
for the <S%G3709>anger<s%> of <S%G435>man<s%> does not <S%G2038>achieve<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G659>putting<s%> <S%G659>aside<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4507>filthiness<s%> and [all] that <S%G4050>remains<s%> of <S%G2549>wickedness,<s%> in <S%G4240>humility<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1721>implanted,<s%> which is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> your <S%G5590>souls.<s%>
But <S%G1096>prove<s%> yourselves <S%G4163>doers<s%> of the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and not <S%G3441>merely<s%> <S%G202>hearers<s%> who <S%G3884>delude<s%> <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> is a <S%G202>hearer<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%> and not a <S%G4163>doer,<s%> he is <S%G7073>like<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> who <S%G2657>looks<s%> at his <S%G1078>natural<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> in a <S%G2072>mirror;<s%>

for [once] he has <S%G2657>looked<s%> at <S%G1438>himself<s%> and <S%G565>gone<s%> <S%G565>away,<s%> he has <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> <S%G3697>what<s%> <S%G3697>kind<s%> of <S%G3697>person<s%> he was.

But one who <S%G3879>looks<s%> <S%G3879>intently<s%> at the <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> the [law] of <S%G1657>liberty,<s%> and <S%G3887>abides<s%> by it, not having <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G1953>forgetful<s%> <S%G202>hearer<s%> but an <S%G2041>effectual<s%> <S%G4163>doer,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> shall be <S%G3107>blessed<s%> in <S%G4162>what<s%> he <S%G4162>does.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1380>thinks<s%> himself to be <S%G2357>religious,<s%> and yet does not <S%G5468>bridle<s%> his <S%G1100>tongue<s%> but <S%G538>deceives<s%> his [own] <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man's <S%G2356>religion<s%> is <S%G3152>worthless.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> is <S%G2513>pure<s%> and <S%G283>undefiled<s%> <S%G2356>religion<s%> in the <S%G3844>sight<s%> of [our] <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father,<s%> to <S%G1980>visit<s%> <S%G3737>orphans<s%> and <S%G5503>widows<s%> in their <S%G2347>distress,<s%> [and] to <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G1438>oneself<s%> <S%G784>unstained<s%> by the <S%G2889>world.<s%>
